text: Satyikarera prarthana tamra'i jan'ya. Ara tamke chere diye tara yadera kache prarthana janaya tara tadera prati kono prakarera sara deya na, tabe yena se tara du'i hata panira dike bariye diyeche yate ta tara mukhe paumchute pare, kintu ta tate paumchube na. Bastutah abisbasidera prarthana bhrantite bhinna naya.
